sentences.en: An imaginary line drawn through these two stars points to Andromeda galaxy.
sentences.cn: 有一条你想象中的线穿过这两颗星星到达仙女座星系.
安德罗墨达: “这不是的战斗! ”

sentences.en: Andromeda detected hundreds of thousands of machine parts in the area.
sentences.cn: 仙女座号探测到有成百上千的机械部件在那个区域.

sentences.en: Andromeda was destined to marry Prince Calibos.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁美达命中注定要嫁给卡里波斯王子.

sentences.en: Andromeda, this is our final offer.
sentences.cn: 仙女座号, 这是我们的最后建议.

sentences.en: By accepting the Andromeda, I sanctioned it.
sentences.cn: 通过接手仙女座号, 我同意了它.

sentences.en: In my opinion, this final wasn't'Andromeda ownage '.
sentences.cn: 在我看来, 这次决赛不是'Andromedaownage'.

sentences.en: It cannot be that Hades is Andromeda!
sentences.cn: 为什么哈迪斯会和仙女座长着同一张脸?

sentences.en: It's like cancer, and if it doesn't stop growing, Andromeda will die.
sentences.cn: 这就像癌症一样, 如果他们不停止成长, 仙女座号就会完蛋的.

sentences.en: Japanese andromeda can be processed into drugs to prevent pests.
sentences.cn: 马醉木可以加工成药剂,预防虫害.

sentences.en: M 31 ( Andromeda galaxy ) is the biggest spiral in the Local Group.
sentences.cn: M31 ( 仙女星系 ) 是本星系群中最大的旋涡星系.

sentences.en: Observational properties of the largest Local Group spiral M 31 ( Andromeda galaxy ) are presented.
sentences.cn: 介绍了本星系群中最大的旋涡星系M31 ( 仙女星系 ) 的基本观测性质.

sentences.en: Our galaxy is on a collision course with the Andromeda galaxy.
sentences.cn: 我们的星系刻正移向与仙女座星系碰撞之途.

sentences.en: Perseus could fight against Medusa for Andromeda.
sentences.cn: 波秀士(英仙座)为保护安卓米达(仙女座)对抗曼杜莎.

sentences.en: The knight of Andromeda ended up being the reincarnation of the lord Hades.
sentences.cn: 可是那个仙女座的圣斗士竟然是哈迪斯大人本人?

phrases.tran_cn: 仙女座星系；仙女座星云

trans.tran_cn: 埃塞俄比亚的公主，仙女座
trans.tran_en: the daughter of Cassiopeia and wife of Perseus, who saved her from a sea monster
